rules_text:
Artillery [i](This creature gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.)[/i]
Whenever Baron Von K'alinn blocks or is blocked by a creature with greater power, exile that creature. You lose life equal to its power.
flavor_text: [i]Mastery of vampiric weaponry and hundreds of years of pent-up hostility make for a surprisingly effective combatant.[/i]
